nodes.text: Narq, also known as Narqui, was a wet, gloomy planet located in the galaxy's Colonies region at the heart of the Neimoidian purse-worlds that was the homeworld of the Narquois species, whose ancestors dwelled in the trees of the world's fungus forests. Because of the fungi's blue coloration, most of the Narquois' physical features were of the same color to serve as camouflage. Seeing the natives as little more than cheap labor, the Neimoidians occupied Narq and treated the Narquois as virtual serfs for centuries.
